events.message: I am filing a claim for a car accident that occurred yesterday involving my vehicle and another car at an intersection.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident category following the initial review of the incident details.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the investigation and communication for this auto accident claim.
We have officially acknowledged receipt of your accident claim and will begin processing shortly.
Please provide photos of the damaged vehicle, the police report, and any medical bills related to the accident.
The requested documents including vehicle damage photos and police report have been submitted for review.
The investigation into the circumstances of the car collision has officially begun to determine fault and damages.
The investigation of the accident is complete; all facts and evidence have been reviewed thoroughly.
A settlement offer has been prepared based on the assessed damages and liability from the collision.
Customer expressed dissatisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and requested a re-evaluation.
Due to customer concerns, the claim has been escalated to a senior claims adjuster for further review.
After re-assessment, the claim has been approved with an adjusted settlement amount.
The payment for the approved settlement amount has been issued and should arrive within 5 business days.
The claim has been officially closed following successful settlement and payment to the insured party.
